dcterms:description: SST-2 is a collection of movie reviews along with human annotations. All the samples are classified as positive or negative.
dcterms:title: SST-2

dcterms:creator: A. L. Maas
R. E. Daly
P. T. Pham
D. Huang
A. Y. Ng
C. Potts
dcterms:description: IMDB is a collection of highly polarized reviews from the movies database site IMDb. A negative and positive review has scores of ≤ 4 and ≥ 7 out of 10 respectively. There are no neutral reviews included in the dataset.
dcterms:title: IMDB
